entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Platform-specific build actions and functionality missing depending on the order of items in TargetFramework tag #26718
  • Wrong page routes in OnNavigated when using GoToAsync with a tab bar #26715
  • Setting Shell.CurrentItem does not trigger the OnNavigating event (only OnNavigated) #26714
  • iOS app crashes when calling GetValue on Virtual Property #26707
  • Enable the inheritance of the parent's BindingContext for Behaviors, based on a Flag #26705
  • [Windows] TableSection.Remove(Item) Removes all the Items from TableView instead of just removing the particular Item #26699
  • Expose styling for the tooltips #26695
  • [Windows] MAUI Label alignment not same in Windows 10 and Window 11 #26691
  • Starting from 9.0.12 TitleBar Missing From Modal Pages #26690
    .NET 9 SR2.2

Closed

  • Can't opt out of edetoedge opt out. #26683
  • [Windows] Switch always has a MinWidth of 154 #26700
  • MAUI vs-code can't recognized JDK #25906
  • Error Cannot create an IOS archive . Process cannot be executed on XMA server #25622
  • create xarchive with dotnet publish on windows #25149
  • Hot Reload does not seem to work #25637
  • How to change the size of MAUI Shell back button? For improved use when using tablets with gloves #26698
  • MAUI Entry in Windows always shows ClearButton despite ClearButtonVisibility set to 'Never' #25473
    Backlog
  • After updating to v9.0.21, the Preferences storage has been relocated from the LocalAppData folder to the AppData folder on the Windows platform. #26602
    .NET 9 SR2.2
  • [Android] Collection view has no scroll bar #25468
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • CollectionView shows no ScrollBar #11369
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 57 #26717
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 56 #26716
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [release/9.0.1xx-sr2] Revert "[Windows] `FileSystem.Current.AppDataDirectory` returns different path after updating to latest version - fix" #26713
    p/0, .NET 9 SR2.2
  • Fixed the ListView SelectedItem not cleared after the list is cleared #26712
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 55 #26710
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fixed CollectionView ScrollTo Method Crash with Invalid GroupIndex Value. #26706
    community ✨
  • Fixed the FlyoutPage.Flyout Disappearing When Maximizing the Window on Mac Platform #26701
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix up relevant CA1416 warnings - Set 1 #26696
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for CollectionView SelectedItem loses Background after opening and closing a Modal page #26694
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Navigation Toolbar Visibility Issue on Dynamic Flyout Reset in FlyoutPage. #26693
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion

Merged

  • Revert "[Windows] `FileSystem.Current.AppDataDirectory` returns different path after updating to latest version - fix" #26685
    t/breaking 💥, area-essentials, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, .NET 9 SR2.2
  • [ci] Update global.json #26697
    area-infrastructure
  • Fixed [Windows] MAUI Entry in Windows always shows ClearButton despite ClearButtonVisibility set to 'Never' #25567
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-entry, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Android] Fix for Softkeyboard Return key of an Entry control shows Done when the property ReturnType is set to Next #26501
    community ✨, area-controls-entry, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Android] Added a scroll bar for collection view #25471
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Testing] Enable snapshot tests on Catalyst #25710
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-testing

Updated

  • [ci] Add unit test jobs to dnceng builds #26623
    area-testing
  • [Android] Build maui.aar with the new AndroidGradleProject item #25632
    area-infrastructure
  • [ci] Update stable Android version #26684
    area-infrastructure, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Windows] Optimize `LayoutHandler.Windows.cs` (take 2) #26460
    platform/windows 🪟, area-layout, community ✨, t/perf
  • Fix up relevant CA1416 warnings #26593
    partner/cat 😻, area-infrastructure
  • Fix more things with fonts (embedded) and unpackaged apps #26515
    area-fonts
  • Support for Setting Switch Off State Color #25068
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-switch, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • [iOS] Shell toolbar items #20510
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [iOS] Using long-press navigation on back button with shell pages - fix #24003
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Add the scenario tests for the skiasharp backend #26591
    area-testing, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Mac Catalyst] Set window dimensions #24001
    platform/macOS 🍏, p/1, community ✨, area-controls-window, .NET 9 SR3
  • [iOS] Set height for EmptyView if is not an IView #26680
    area-controls-collectionview, i/regression, .NET 9 SR3
  • Change iOS SetNeedsLayout propagation mechanism #26629
    area-layout, community ✨, .NET 9 SR3
  • Fix for CarouselView doesnot scroll corresponding to ItemsUpdatingScrollMode when collection modified #26608
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix TabBar visibility when navigating back from a non-tabbed page to a tabbed page #25004
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix SafeArea adjustments #25315
    area-layout, community ✨, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Windows] Fix for wrong secondary ToolbarItem size #25550
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • IndicatorView with DataTemplate - improvements #24776
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-activityindicator, .NET 9 SR3
  • Fix for TabBar Navigation does not invoke its IQueryAttributable.ApplyQueryAttributes(query) #25663
    area-navigation, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Relative layout content disappeared when Relative layout has the border with border stroke element. #24841
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, area-layout, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • CollectionView Items display issue when Header is resized on iOS #21812
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [iOS] CV - Reset ScrollOffset when item source changes #26376
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, collectionview-cv2
  • Templated indicator view - improvements #25642
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Enhanced Stepper to Support Dynamic Increment Mapping #24396
    community ✨, area-controls-stepper, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • The fix for child FlexLayout content appearing no longer works starting from version 8.0.61 #26665
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for Application Crash When Updating ToolbarItem Icon and Navigating Between Shell Pages #26126
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed iOS button flickering animation with is Top or Bottom ContentLayout when text it updated at run time #25662
    area-layout, area-controls-button, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Keyboard Scrolling in editors with Center or End VerticalTextAlignment #25827
    community ✨, area-keyboard, area-controls-editor, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • Fixed Editor HorizontalTextAlignment does not update at run time #25129
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
  • Don’t call NSAttributedString with HTML from a background thread #26153
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, area-controls-label, .NET 9 SR3
  • [iOS] Transparent button border color when border color is not set #25373
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [Windows] Fix for SearchHandler Fails to Display Results. #26572
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 53 #26675
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed - [Windows] ListView Items Text Not Rendered inside the TabbedPage #26681
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] CollectionView with header and "complex" item will have the wrong position after a refresh with a RefreshView #26575
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
